name: TCG Duels but you're a MONSTER CARD
name_original: TCG Duels but you're a MONSTER CARD
description:
Fight as a monster card in the card game, and evolve into thousands of different AI-generated monsters! 

Yes, thousands! Thank you Stable Diffusion.

In this game, you are a card instead of the card player.

That means, you can only watch the silly plays of your partner and waiting for their decisions of sending you on the pitch. 

Despite of fight hard and keep getting stronger, you also MUST work for the oppotunity of getting on the duel venue! 

The way to get into the fight is hard and dishonorable: to make your partner like your characteristcs - the element type, race and outfit of the card. The card duelers will only first send up the card they like, instead of the stronger card.

There were many machanics I didn't finish the in-game-display.... Therefore the game may look messy and a little confusing.

The rogue-lite part was cut off.

Bugs were not well tested and fixed.

That's because I delayed almost everything to the last hours LOL. I repent!
